snippet.title: Q: Liquid physics game
snippet.description: settled at the bottom of the bucket. User can pump in air from the bottom of the bucket, and the rings and the mud will react to the air pressure applied from the bottom, as in a normal world. Can I … I have to develop a game which will have water inside a bucket. The user can make the water move around the bucket by shaking the device. There will be light weight rings and mud inside the bucket …
